title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.14 - Accidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.14 - Accidents

State Regulations

The driver of any vehicle involved in an accident in, at or
upon any terminal or terminal highway, which results in injury to any person or
damage to any property shall immediately stop such vehicle at the scene of the
accident, render such assistance as may be needed, and give his name, address, and operator's license and registration number to the person injured or to any
officer or witnesses of the injury. The operator of such vehicle shall make a
report of such accident to the manager and in accordance with the
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
